  • Method Details

    • setCinemaManager

      public void setCinemaManager(Controller.CinemaManager cinemasCtrl)
      Change the Cinema Manager referenced by this manager
      Parameters:
      cinemasCtrl - This controller's newly set Cinema Manager

    • getCinemaManager

      public Controller.CinemaManager getCinemaManager()
      Gets the Cinema Manager referenced by this manager
      Returns:
      CinemaManager This controller's Cinema Manager

    • createTimeslot

      public void createTimeslot(String code, Model.Movie movie, LocalDateTime timeslotDateTime)
      Create a new Time Slot and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new Session object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write Session object to a new file and save
      Parameters:
      code - Cinema code of this session
      movie - Movie of this session
      timeslotDateTime - Date and time of this session

    • getLastID

      public int getLastID()
      Return the ID of the last movie in the database
      Returns:
      int ID of last Movie in the database

    • getAllTimeslot

      public ArrayList<Model.MovieTimeslot> getAllTimeslot()
      Read every Cinema in the database file and return them
      Returns:
      Model.Cinema Return list of Cinemas if found, else empty list

    • getSpecificTimeslot

      public Model.MovieTimeslot getSpecificTimeslot(String code, LocalDateTime timeslotDate)
      Read every Time Slot of a cinema at a specific date in the Database file
      Parameters:
      code - Cinema's code to check
      timeslotDate - Value of date to find
      Returns:
      Model.MovieTimeSlot Return list of Time Slot if any, else empty list

    • getAllTimeslotByCinema

      public ArrayList<Model.MovieTimeslot> getAllTimeslotByCinema(String code, LocalDate timeslotDate)
      Read every Time Slot of a cinema at a specific date in the Database file
      Parameters:
      code - Cinema's code to check
      timeslotDate - Value of date to find
      Returns:
      Model.MovieTimeSlot Return list of Time Slot if any, else empty list

    • getTimeslot

      public ArrayList<Model.MovieTimeslot> getTimeslot(int choice, Object attribute)
      Read every Time Slot based on a certain value of a given attribute in the Database file and then return them
      Parameters:
      choice - Given attribute to be checked (based on constant as defined)
      attribute - Value of given attribute to find
      Returns:
      Model.Session Return list of Sessions if any, else empty list

    • getTimeslotByID

      public Model.MovieTimeslot getTimeslotByID(int ID)
      Read a Time Slot of a given time slot ID in the Database file and return
      Parameters:
      ID - Time Slot's ID to find
      Returns:
      timeslot Return time slot if found, else null object

    • updateTimeslotByCinema

      public void updateTimeslotByCinema(int choice, String code, Object oldValue, Object newValue)
      Update a Time Slot with new value according to input cinema code and attribute in Database file
      Parameters:
      choice - Given attribute to check (based on constant as defined)
      code - Code of cinema to update
      oldValue - Value of given attribute to find
      newValue - New value of session's attribute

    • updateTimeslotByID

      public void updateTimeslotByID(int choice, int ID, Object newValue)
      Update a Time Slot of a given time slot ID based on given attribute in Database file
      Parameters:
      choice - Given attribute to be checked (based on defined constants)
      ID - Time Slot's ID to check for
      newValue - New value of session's attribute

    • updateSeatList

      public void updateSeatList(int ID, Model.SeatList seatList)
      Update the availability of seats in a Time Slot corresponding to a given time slot ID in Database file
      Parameters:
      ID - Time Slot's ID to check
      seatList - New value of time slot's seats availability

    • updateMovie

      public void updateMovie(int choice, int ID, Object newValue)
      Update a Movie's attribute in Time Slot corresponding to matching movieID in Database file
      Parameters:
      choice - Attribute of movie to update
      ID - ID of Movie to find
      newValue - New value of Movie's attribute

    • deleteTimeslotByCinema

      public void deleteTimeslotByCinema(String code, LocalDateTime timeslotDate)
      Delete Time Slots specified by cinema code and datetime value from the database file
      Parameters:
      code - Time Slots with this cinema code will be deleted
      timeslotDate - Time Slots at this date and time will be deleted

    • deleteTimeslotByID

      public void deleteTimeslotByID(int ID)
      Delete Time Slots specified by session ID from the database file
      Parameters:
      ID - Time Slots with this ID will be deleted

    • deleteTimeslotByMovie

      public void deleteTimeslotByMovie(int ID)
      Delete Time Slots specified by MovieID from the database file
      Parameters:
      ID - Time Slots with this MovieID will be deleted

    • assignSeat

      public boolean assignSeat(Model.SeatList seatList, int seatID, int timeslotID)
      Mark a seat of a time slot as occupied, according to seat id and session ID
      Parameters:
      seatList - Seating Plan of the timeslot
      seatID - Seat ID to be marked as occupied
      timeslotID - Timeslot which the seat will be marked occupied
      Returns:
      boolean Return true if seat has been marked occupied Return false if seat is already marked occupied
